trans-unit.source: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the RSA algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 提供 RSA 演算法的新一代密碼編譯 (CNG) 實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng> class is derived from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng>類別衍生自<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>類別。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is not a drop-in replacement for existing uses of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，它並不表示掉落對於現有的使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng> uses a programming model that is similar to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng> class rather than the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng> 使用類似的程式設計模型<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng>類別而非<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>類別。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: The key used by <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng> is managed by a separate <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的金鑰<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng>由個別管理<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> has a key that is directly tied to the operations of the type itself.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>有直接繫結至的作業類型本身的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng> performs such operations as signing and verifying signatures by using properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng> object, just as <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng> uses its object properties to control signing and verification operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng> 執行這類作業簽章和使用的屬性來驗證簽章<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng>物件，就如同<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng>會使用它的物件屬性，以控制簽署和驗證作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng> class is an implementation of the RSA algorithm using the Windows CNG libraries and isn't available on operating systems other than Windows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng>類別是使用 Windows CNG 程式庫的 RSA 演算法的實作，而且無法在非 Windows 作業系統上使用。

trans-unit.source: For applications which aren't doing Windows interop, you're encouraged to use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> instead of referencing this type directly.
trans-unit.target: 針對還未執行 Windows interop 應用程式，您已建議您使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>而不是直接參考此類型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng" /> class with a random 2,048-bit key pair.
trans-unit.target: 使用隨機 2,048 位元金鑰組，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The size of the key to generate in bits.
trans-unit.target: 要產生的金鑰大小 (以位元為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng" /> class with a randomly generated key of the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定大小之隨機產生的金鑰，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Valid key sizes range from 384 to 16,384 bits, in increments of 8.
trans-unit.target: 有效金鑰大小範圍從 384 到 16384 位元，以 8 為增量單位。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that a minimum size of 2,048 bits be used for all keys.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議的 2048 位元的大小下限，用於所有索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keySize" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keySize" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: The key to use for RSA operations.
trans-unit.target: RSA 作業所要使用的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng" /> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的金鑰，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.AlgorithmGroup%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> of `key` must be <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithmGroup.Rsa%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.AlgorithmGroup%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的`key`必須<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithmGroup.Rsa%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a copy of the key.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立金鑰的副本。

trans-unit.source: Even if `key` is disposed, the copy of this key object in RSA remains alive.
trans-unit.target: 即使`key`已處置，RSA 在此索引鍵物件的複本會保持運作。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is not a valid RSA key.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 不是有效的 RSA 金鑰。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The data to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: 要解密的資料。

trans-unit.source: The padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 填補模式。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts input data using the specified padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定填補模式來加密輸入資料。

trans-unit.source: The decrypted data.
trans-unit.target: 已解密的資料。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="data" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="data" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="padding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="padding" /> does not equal <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Pkcs1" />, or else the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode" /> of <paramref name="padding" /> does not equal <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPaddingMode.Oaep" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 不等於 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Pkcs1" />，或者 <paramref name="padding" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Mode" /> 不等於 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPaddingMode.Oaep" />。

trans-unit.source: The cipher text to be decrypted.
trans-unit.target: 要解密的密碼文字。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts the input data using the private key.
trans-unit.target: 使用私密金鑰來解密輸入資料。

trans-unit.source: The resulting decryption of the <paramref name="rgb" /> parameter in plain text.
trans-unit.target: 所產生之純文字的 <paramref name="rgb" /> 參數解密。

trans-unit.source: This method call is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The data to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: 要加密的資料。

trans-unit.source: The padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 填補模式。

trans-unit.source: Encrypts the input data using the specified padding.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定填補加密輸入的資料。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> .
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Byte" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="data" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="data" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="padding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="padding" /> does not equal <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pkcs1" /> or <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pss" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 不等於 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pkcs1" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pss" />。

trans-unit.source: The plain text to be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 要加密的純文字。

trans-unit.source: Encrypts the input data using the public key.
trans-unit.target: 使用公開金鑰，來加密輸入資料。

trans-unit.source: The resulting encryption of the <paramref name="rgb" /> parameter as cipher text.
trans-unit.target: 所產生之密碼文字的 <paramref name="rgb" /> 參數加密。

trans-unit.source: This method call is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include private parameters; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要包含私用參數，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Exports the key used by the RSA object into a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 RSA 物件所使用的金鑰匯出到 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: The key used by the RSA object.
trans-unit.target: RSA 物件所使用的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The RSA parameters.
trans-unit.target: RSA 參數。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the existing key that the current instance is working with by creating a new <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey" /> for the parameters structure.
trans-unit.target: 為參數結構建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey" />，來取代目前執行個體正在使用的現有金鑰。

trans-unit.source: If `parameters` contains only an exponent and modulus, only a public key is imported.
trans-unit.target: 如果`parameters`只有指數和模數，僅包含公開金鑰是匯入。

trans-unit.source: If `parameters` also contains P and Q values, a full key pair is imported.
trans-unit.target: 如果`parameters`也包含完整的索引鍵組會匯入 P 和 Q 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parameters" /> contains neither an exponent nor a modulus.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 並未包含指數和模數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parameters" /> is not a valid RSA key.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 不是有效的 RSA 金鑰。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="parameters" /> is a full key pair and the default KSP is used.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parameters" /> 是完整金鑰組並使用預設 KSP。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that will be used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng" /> object for any cryptographic operation that it performs.
trans-unit.target: 取得金鑰，<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng" /> 物件會將這個金鑰用於其所執行的任何密碼編譯作業。

trans-unit.source: The key used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng" /> 物件所使用的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object is disposed if the key is reset, for instance by changing the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.KeySize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.ImportParameters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to create a new key, or by disposing of the parent <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>物件已處置，如果索引鍵重設，例如藉由變更<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.KeySize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.ImportParameters%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來建立新的金鑰，或透過處置的父代<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>物件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should ensure that the key object is no longer used in these cases.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您應該確定在這些情況下，不會再使用索引鍵物件。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object is not the same as the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object passed to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng.%23ctor%2A> constructor, if that constructor was used.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>物件不是相同<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>物件傳遞至<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng.%23ctor%2A>建構函式，如果已使用該建構函式。

trans-unit.source: However, it will point to the same CNG key.
trans-unit.target: 不過，它會指向相同的 CNG 金鑰。

trans-unit.source: for operating with unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於與 unmanaged 程式碼的作業。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the key exchange algorithm available with this implementation of RSA.
trans-unit.target: 取得可透過這個 RSA 實作所提供之金鑰交換演算法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns "RSA".
trans-unit.target: 傳回 "RSA"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the signature algorithm available with this implementation of RSA.
trans-unit.target: 取得可透過這個 RSA 實作所提供之簽章演算法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns "RSA".
trans-unit.target: 傳回 "RSA"。

trans-unit.source: The hash to sign.
trans-unit.target: 要簽署的雜湊。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm name.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊演算法名稱。

trans-unit.source: The padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 填補模式。

trans-unit.source: Signs data that was hashed by using the specified hashing algorithm and padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 簽署資料，該資料已使用指定的雜湊演算法和填補模式進行雜湊處理。

trans-unit.source: The signed data.
trans-unit.target: 已簽署的資料。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hash" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hash" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="padding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" /> property of <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" /> is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" /> 屬性值為 <see langword="null" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="padding" /> does not equal <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pkcs1" /> or <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pss" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 不等於 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pkcs1" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pss" />。

trans-unit.source: The hash to verify.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的雜湊。

trans-unit.source: The signature of the data.
trans-unit.target: 資料的簽章。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm name.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊演算法名稱。

trans-unit.source: The padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 填補模式。

trans-unit.source: Verifies data that was signed and already hashed with the specified algorithm and padding mode.
trans-unit.target: 驗證已簽署且已使用指定演算法和填補模式雜湊處理的資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the signature verifies for the hash; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果雜湊的簽章驗證無誤，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hash" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hash" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="signature" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="signature" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="padding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" /> property of <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" /> is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" /> 屬性值為 <see langword="null" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="padding" /> does not equal <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pkcs1" /> or <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pss" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="padding" /> 不等於 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pkcs1" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pss" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The signature is badly formatted.
trans-unit.target: 簽章的格式不正確。

trans-unit.source: (In the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] and 4.6.1 only; starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)], the method returns <see langword="false" /> if a signature is badly formatted.
trans-unit.target: 僅限 [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] 和 4.6.1；從 [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)] 開始，如果簽章的格式不正確，此方法會傳回 <see langword="false" />。
